channel.title: Hybrid PVP v3 PVP glitch
channel.description: So theres an issue where when you've got a full pack and you die, you lose 4 items. Because if you dont have a full pack, and have 4 spaces open and die, those 4 items go into your pack. How do i make it so when you die, you dont have items unequip from you?

item.title: Hybrid PVP v3 PVP glitch
